assignments.name: Assign_Patient_Cycle_and_Claim_Type
assignments.label: Assign Patient, Cycle and Claim Type

Flow.description: Allows additional items to be added to a claim assuming it has not been finalised.
Flow.label: Medicare Add Additional Items

fields.name: FinalisedText
fields.fieldText: The Medicare Claim for this cycle has already been submitted, You will need to raise an additional claim to add Medicare items.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_FinalisedText
fields.fieldText: This patient has no valid referral, as such items cannot be added at this time.

fields.name: SlectMedicareText
fields.fieldText: Select the Medicare items you would like to add to this claim.
